lines:
Gile Gai: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Gile Gai, a helpful golden chanterelle!
Fungus McShroom: Guile! We've met before! Can't you remember?

Gile Gai: I'm sorry, no.
I had some great time at the beach!
Fungus McShroom: Don't you mean "a great time"?
Gile Gai: I mean both! Now, how can I help you?

options.text: I need a spread-shot ranged spell.
I need to improve my attacking speed.

lines: Fungus McShroom: I need a spread-shot ranged spell.

Gile Gai: Excellent, dude!
Hit multiple crystals from afar or
get up close and inflict epic damage!
Fungus McShroom: I need to improve my attacking speed.
Gile Gai: Hectic problems require hectic solutions, bro!
Gile Gai: McShroom, dude! What can I do for you, bro?

options.text: How do you know my name?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?
Gile Gai: It's wisdom of the waves, dude.
Fungus McShroom: I have trouble believing that.

Gile Gai: Okay, man.
I read the title screen and it said
something about "The Adventures of Fungus McShroom".
Fungus McShroom: Can't argue with that.
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?

Gile Gai: Between the Chocolate Cave and
Strawberry Milk Lake, dude.

Gile Gai: Castle's to the east, and the
Minty Mountains are to the north, bro.
Fungus McShroom: Totally radical.
Fungus McShroom: How are the waves, bro?
Gile Gai: No waves to speak of, man.

Gile Gai: It's as if some higher power
didn't manage to create waves in time.
Fungus McShroom: Bogus!
